data.name: BULLETGROUNDS
data.detailed_description:
Bulletgrounds is an arcadey WW2 themed shooter with large maps, vehicles and the ability to build and destroy various fortifications.
Fast paced combat on land, air and sea (well sea might come in the future).

Customise your unique loadout.


No preset roles, you play the way you want.
Choose your own play style from dozens of weapons and tools.
We were too lazy to create classes.

Jump into a tank, fighter or a Halftrack.


Is the enemy fortified?
No problem, hop into a tank or a plane and blow up their fortifications.

Capture, defend and fortify objectives.


Bunker up!
Place those tank traps and sandbags!

Influence development in discord! (Found in news/links section!)

Featuring


  • Totally realistically unrealistic weapons from WW2!
  • Even more unrealistic vehicles! Use tanks! Fly with planes! Fly with tanks! Seriously physics are hard!
  • Huge outdoor levels. Feel free to ignore objects and just drive to the sunset. Your team probably wont miss you anyway.
  • Incompetent devs
  • Destruction. Oh boy, smack those buildings, bunkers and walls down!
  • Buildmode: Oh boy, erect those buildings, bunkers and walls!
  • Not battle royale. Unless you throw enough cash at us.

data.short_description: Bulletgrounds is World War 2 themed multiplayer arcade shooter that features vehicles, large maps, destruction and build elements. Official Discord link in announcements!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 2500k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: i7 6700k
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980TI
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
